title: Add protocol reference alignment analysis package
body:
## Summary
- add a reference matrix covering current @apply handoffs and artifact evidence paths
- provide a renumbering adjustment prompt with artifact remapping guidance
- document a validation script outline and risk assessment for the protocol renumbering effort

## Testing
- not run (documentation-only change)
